meanings.definition: The quality of being capable of being corrected.
meanings.sent1: Her teacher appreciated her corrigibilities in fixing mistakes.
meanings.sent2: The software's corrigibilities allowed for easy adjustments.
meanings.sent3: His endless corrigibilities in spelling made him the class spelling bee champion.
meanings.sent4: The team's corrigibilities in strategy turned the game around.
meanings.sent5: The flexibility of the material showcased its corrigibilities in design.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being able to be improved or rectified.
meanings.sent1: The company's success was due to its corrigibilities in adapting to market changes.
meanings.sent2: The corrigibilities of the plan made it easy to adjust as needed.
meanings.sent3: The chef's corrigibilities in recipes always led to delicious surprises.
meanings.sent4: Her positive attitude showed great corrigibilities in handling setbacks.
meanings.sent5: The team's corrigibilities in teamwork made them unbeatable.
